Title: Color Out of Space
Writer: H.P. Lovecraft (based on the short story "The Colour out of Space" by), Richard Stanley, Scarlett Amaris
Actors: Nicolas Cage, Joely Richardson, Madeleine Arthur, Elliot Knight
Plot: A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.
Production: SpectreVision, XYZ Films, ACE Pictures Entertainment
